textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit * Imported. * Wash cold. * 51% cotton/49% spandex. Ultra lightweight and powerful, Thinvisible fabrics provide the perfect blend of comfort and control. This shapewear thong effortlessly smooths the tummy while eliminating panty lines. High waist features seamless elastic band. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer After an endless search for invisible yet supportive underwear, Lucy Hosken launched Nearly Nude in 2005. With a classic, feminine, and comfortable approach to shapewear, this Australian-based line fills a gap in the market, catering to a woman’s daily wardrobe, regardless of her shape or size. Featuring affordable, top-quality seamless lingerie, Nearly Nude shapewear has achieved enormous success worldwide.
